players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Suspicious about Alice, Bob was a villager. Watch out."
Diana: "Will keep an eye on Alice as Charlie suggested. Any deaths tonight?"
You: "Will keep a close eye on Alice. Charlie confirmed mafia."
Charlie: "Watch Alice, she's the detective. Stay cautious."
You: "Will keep Alice under watch. Charlie confirmed."
Diana: "Monitoring Alice closely as per Charlie's tip. Stay vigilant."

players.name: Bob

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.

You killed Bob.

Day 1 begins.
You: "Suspicious about Alice, Bob was a villager. Watch out."
Diana: "Will keep an eye on Alice as Charlie suggested. Any deaths tonight?"

You: "Watch Alice, she's the detective. Stay cautious."
Alice: "Will keep Alice under watch. Charlie confirmed."
Diana: "Monitoring Alice closely as per Charlie's tip. Stay vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
